h3.div: Welcome to Bluffton Exempted Village Schools!

div.p: Our mission is to "provide a safe and stimulating environment in which flexibility is encouraged in meeting the needs of every student." We also strive to "develop individuals who demonstrate problem-solving skills, personal responsibility, and a desire for life-long learning."

We, at the Bluffton Exempted Village School District, take great pride in making the educational experience for all our students an excellent one. Our district provides a welcoming environment that challenges our students and prepares them for the future. Small class sizes allow for individualized instructor attention, and state-of-the-art technology is offered throughout the district. Strong, positive relationships between the school and community are at the heart of our efforts, and members of both groups are committed to providing students in Bluffton Schools with the best learning environment in the state of Ohio.
